20110113140656.000|20110113140701.000|CC1|90% OF THE OAKS AND SYCAMORES   
20110113140701.000|20110113140703.000|CC1|WERE CHOPPED DOWN LAST NIGHT.   
20110113140703.000|20110113140703.000|CC1|L.A.                            
20110113140703.000|20110113140704.000|CC1|COUNTY OFFICIALS SAID THEY NEED 
20110113140704.000|20110113140706.000|CC1|TO CLEAR THE 11 ACRES OF LAND   
20110113140706.000|20110113140708.000|CC1|FOR FLOOD CONTROL AND WATER     
20110113140708.000|20110113140710.000|CC1|CONSERVATION EFFORTS.
